price: "Que herdará de mim a ciência e herdará, da família de Jacó, o reino. E faze-o, Senhor meu, agradável a Ti."
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
